For anyone who wants to know: The girlfriend's side-story was a later expansion by the author Ryuuichi, revealing recounting her part of the whole story:   After the final orgy, she gets raped again by senpai because she tells him she wants to end it, as she still loves her boyfriend. She later moves in with the MC because her low resolve causes her to get repeatedly blackmailed, and staying with MC compensates for questionable decision-making skills. Low-IQ-female-gets-blackmailed scenarios bore me, but this is as good an ending from an NTR as you'll get.
